kv8.2:1.15_0: Kāmabhavassa ca rūpabhavassa ca antare atthi antarābhavoti?
kv8.2:1.19_0: Rūpabhavassa ca arūpabhavassa ca antare atthi antarābhavoti?
kv8.2:2.1_0: Kāmabhavassa ca rūpabhavassa ca antare natthi antarābhavoti?
kv8.2:2.3_0: Hañci kāmabhavassa ca rūpabhavassa ca antare natthi antarābhavo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv8.2:2.5_0: Rūpabhavassa ca arūpabhavassa ca antare natthi antarābhavoti?
kv8.2:2.7_0: Hañci rūpabhavassa ca arūpabhavassa ca antare natthi antarābhavo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv8.2:3.3_0: Pañcamī sā yoni, chaṭṭhamī sā gati, aṭṭhamī sā viññāṇaṭṭhiti, dasamo so sattāvāsoti?
kv8.2:3.7_0: Antarābhavo bhavo gati sattāvāso saṁsāro yoni viññāṇaṭṭhiti attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?
kv8.2:3.13_0: antarābhave sattā jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti cavanti upapajjantīti?
kv8.2:3.15_0: antarābhave atthi rūpaṁ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv8.2:4.1_1: kāmabhavo bhavo gati sattāvāso saṁsāro yoni viññāṇaṭṭhiti attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?
kv8.2:4.3_1: antarābhavo bhavo gati sattāvāso saṁsāro yoni viññāṇaṭṭhiti attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?
kv8.2:4.13_0: kāmabhave sattā jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti cavanti upapajjantīti?
kv8.2:4.15_0: Antarābhave sattā jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti cavanti upapajjantīti?
kv8.2:4.17_0: kāmabhave atthi rūpaṁ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv8.2:4.19_0: Antarābhave atthi rūpaṁ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv8.2:5.1_1: rūpabhavo bhavo gati sattāvāso saṁsāro yoni viññāṇaṭṭhiti attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?
kv8.2:5.3_1: antarābhavo bhavo gati sattāvāso saṁsāro yoni viññāṇaṭṭhiti attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?
kv8.2:5.13_0: rūpabhave sattā jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti cavanti upapajjantīti?
kv8.2:5.15_0: Antarābhave sattā jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti cavanti upapajjantīti?
kv8.2:5.17_0: rūpabhave atthi rūpaṁ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv8.2:5.19_0: Antarābhave atthi rūpaṁ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv8.2:6.1_1: arūpabhavo bhavo gati sattāvāso saṁsāro yoni viññāṇaṭṭhiti attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?
kv8.2:6.3_1: antarābhavo bhavo gati sattāvāso saṁsāro yoni viññāṇaṭṭhiti attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?
kv8.2:6.13_0: arūpabhave sattā jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti cavanti upapajjantīti?
kv8.2:6.15_0: Antarābhave sattā jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti cavanti upapajjantīti?
kv8.2:6.17_0: arūpabhave atthi vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv8.2:6.19_0: Antarābhave atthi vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv8.2:7.7_0: Hañci sabbesaññeva sattānaṁ natthi antarābhavo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv8.2:8.7_0: Hañci ānantariyassa puggalassa natthi antarābhavo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv8.2:9.15_0: Hañci arūpūpagassa puggalassa natthi antarābhavo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv8.2:11.5_0: Hañci antarāparinibbāyī puggalo atthi, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv8.2:12.1_0: Antarāparinibbāyī puggalo atthīti katvā atthi antarābhavoti?
kv8.2:12.3_0: Upahaccaparinibbāyī puggalo atthīti katvā atthi upahaccabhavoti?
kv8.2:12.5_0: antarāparinibbāyī puggalo atthīti katvā atthi antarābhavoti?
kv8.2:12.8_0: sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī puggalo atthīti katvā atthi sasaṅkhārabhavoti?
